title: Marsupilami
overview: In the jungle of Palumbia live the Marsupilami, the Marsupilamie and her three babies Bobo, Bibi and Bibu. The Marsupilami is agile and generous, greedy and cheeky, and ensures his family a peaceful life deep in the jungle of Palumbia. But many want to catch a glimpse of its yellow, black spotted fur - at their own risk! Because the tropical flora and fauna holds many secrets...
